title: Amulet of fury (or)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The amulet of fury (or) is an amulet of fury with a fury ornament kit attached to it. The attached ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add aesthetics to the amulet. It costs 2,938,531 for both the parts to make the amulet of fury (or).

Item ID12436

The amulet of fury (or) is an amulet of fury with a fury ornament kit attached to it. The attached ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add aesthetics to the amulet. It costs 2,938,531 for both the parts to make the amulet of fury (or).

While the amulet is untradeable in its ornamented state, it can be dismantled anytime, returning the tradeable amulet and ornament kit.

 Attack bonuses
+10+10+10+10+10
 Defence bonuses
+15+15+15+15+15
 Other bonusesSlot
+8+0+0%+5List

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
3 July 2014
(update)

Fixed a stretching issue with the amulet of fury (or) on female players.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

The amulet of fury (or) bears a striking resemblance to the Mythosaur skull emblem (also commonly known as the Symbol of Mandalore), one of the most recognisable icons from the Star Wars universe.

[[File:Amulet of fury (or) detail.png|left|100px]]
The '''amulet of fury (or)''' is an [[amulet of fury]] with a [[fury ornament kit]] attached to it. The attached ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add aesthetics to the amulet. It costs {{Coins|{{GEP|Amulet of fury}}+{{GEP|Fury ornament kit}}}} for both the parts to make the amulet of fury (or).

While the amulet is untradeable in its ornamented state, it can be dismantled anytime, returning the tradeable amulet and ornament kit.
